definition: describing a circle, an advertisement, usually printed on a page or in a leaflet, intended for wide distribution
details:
adjective
- describing a circle
= synonyms: rotary, orbitual
- having a circular shape
= synonyms: round
noun
- an advertisement, usually printed on a page or in a leaflet, intended for wide distribution
= example: an advertisement, usually printed on a page or in a leaflet, intended for wide distribution
= synonyms: handbill, broadsheet, flyer, throwaway, flier, broadside, bill
